title.narrative: Promoting awareness, capacity, advocacy and accountability for NCDs in 7 sub-counties in Kamuli district, Uganda

description.narrative:
The project’s development objective is to “Promote access to NCD health services in 7 sub counties in Kamuli district, by January 2019”.
Note: Non-communicable diseases (NCDs) will be defined as only lifestyle diseases such as: • Chronic cardiovascular diseases: heart attack, hypertension, stroke • Chronic lung diseases: asthma, chronic obstructive lung disease • Cancer: all kinds of cancers • Diabetes NCD Risk factors are: • Lack of exercise, drug abuse e.g. alcohol, smoking, poor/unbalanced diet.
